workflow.name: Turn TikTok comments into AI avatar videos with Dumpling AI, GPT-4 & Captions.ai
workflow.description:
## Who‚Äôs it for

This template is perfect for TikTok creators, content marketers, and social media teams who want to turn viral comments into engaging short-form videos without manually scripting, recording, or editing. If you want to keep up with trends and consistently publish high-quality avatar videos, this workflow automates the entire process from comment selection to enhanced final video.

---

## What it does

The workflow takes TikTok video URLs and their top comments from a Data Table, extracts the transcript using **Dumpling AI**, and uses **GPT-4** to write a natural and engaging TikTok script inspired by the comment. It then generates a full AI avatar video through **Captions.ai**, enhances it with subtitles and B-roll using **Submagic**, and finally saves all video details into **Airtable** for tracking.

Here‚Äôs what happens step by step:  
1. Pulls TikTok videos and their top comments from a Data Table  
2. Sends video URLs to **Dumpling AI** to retrieve transcripts  
3. Feeds both transcript and comment into **GPT-4** to generate a conversational TikTok script  
4. Cleans and formats the script using JavaScript  
5. Sends the script to **Captions.ai** to produce an AI avatar video  
6. Checks video status and retries if needed  
7. Enhances the final video with **Submagic** for captions and effects  
8. Receives the enhanced video via webhook and logs details into **Airtable**

---

## How it works

1. **Schedule Trigger**: Runs automatically at set intervals to start the workflow  
2. **Data Table**: Retrieves TikTok video URLs and associated comments  
3. **Dumpling AI**: Extracts transcripts from the video URLs  
4. **GPT-4**: Generates a compelling TikTok script based on the comment  
5. **JavaScript Node**: Cleans up script formatting for a smooth avatar generation  
6. **Captions.ai**: Creates an AI avatar video from the cleaned script  
7. **Wait & Check**: Monitors video creation status and retries if necessary  
8. **Submagic**: Enhances the video with captions, zooms, and B-roll effects  
9. **Webhook & Airtable**: Receives final video data and saves URL and ID for future use

---

## Requirements

- ‚úÖ **Dumpling AI API key** stored as HTTP header credentials  
- ‚úÖ **OpenAI GPT-4 credentials**  
- ‚úÖ **Captions.ai API credentials**  
- ‚úÖ **Submagic API credentials**  
- ‚úÖ **Airtable base** with fields for `Video URL` and `Caption Video ID`  
- ‚úÖ A properly structured Data Table containing TikTok `Keywords` or video URLs

---

## How to customize

- Adjust the GPT-4 system prompt to shape the tone, style, or format of the TikTok script  
- Change the avatar or creator settings in Captions.ai to match your brand personality  
- Modify Submagic settings to control subtitle styling or B-roll effects  
- Integrate approval steps before final video generation if needed  
- Extend the workflow to auto-publish videos to TikTok or store them in cloud drives

---

> This workflow lets you transform TikTok comments into engaging AI avatar videos with captions and edits, completely on autopilot. It‚Äôs a powerful way to scale content output and stay ahead of trends without manual scripting or filming.

workflow.name: Turn TikTok Comments into AI Avatar Videos with Dumpling AI, GPT-4 & Captions.ai

nodes.name: Get TikTok Video & Comments from DataTable

values.content:
You are a skilled TikTok content creator. I will give you a video transcript and the top comment from that video. Study both carefully and find the best content idea from the comment that can spark engagement and curiosity. Using that idea, write a very engaging TikTok video script that someone can read word for word when filming.

The script should feel natural, conversational, and attention grabbing right from the first line. Do not include titles, labels, explanations, or any extra text before or after the script. I only want the raw script itself.

=Here is the video transcript:{{ $json.transcript }}

Here is the top comment: {{ $('Get TikTok Video & Comments from DataTable').item.json.Keywords }}

nodes.name: Was the Captions.ai Video Created Successfully?
Send Final Video to Submagic for Enhancements
Save Final Video Details to Airtable

parameters.content:
## üé¨ Create TikTok Script from Comment & Transcript

This branch runs on schedule and:
1. Pulls a TikTok video + top comment from DataTable
2. Sends the video URL to Dumpling AI to get the transcript
3. Combines the transcript and comment into a GPT-4 prompt
4. GPT-4 returns a ready-to-read TikTok script
5. Cleans the script formatting using JavaScript

‚úÖ This script becomes the base content for the AI avatar video

## ü§ñ Create and Save AI Avatar Video with Captions.ai & Submagic

1. Sends script to Captions.ai to generate avatar video  
2. Waits + checks if video is ready  
3. On success: sends the video to Submagic for auto-editing (subtitles, B-roll, etc.)  
4. Submagic sends the final version to a webhook  


‚úÖ Fully automated short-form video generation pipeline

## üì• Webhook Branch ‚Äì Save Final Video from Submagic

This webhook receives the enhanced video from Submagic once it's ready.

1. Submagic calls the webhook with the final video details  
2. The webhook triggers Airtable  
3. Airtable saves:
   - `Video URL`
   - `Caption Video ID`

‚úÖ This ensures your final video is logged and ready for use or review

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
